publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5349.3 Euan Robson: Post Offices—As an amendment to motion (S2M-5349) in the name of Mr John Swinney, leave out from "expresses" to end and insert "believes that the post office network plays a crucial role in Scotland; notes that this is a reserved issue and supports the Liberal Democrats’ rejection of the recommendation of the UK Government’s post office network consultation paper that a further 2,500 post office branches be closed across the United Kingdom". Supported by: Nora Radcliffe*, Jeremy Purvis*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Iain Smith*, Margaret Smith*, Mike Rumbles*, Donald Gorrie*, Mike Pringle*, John Farquhar Munro*, Mr Jim Wallace*
